altername_name: Pablo Diablo: The Good, The Bad & The Bugly
name: Horrid Henry: The Good, The Bad & The Bugly
overview: My wormy worm little brother has lost his precious Bunny again. Help me on my mission to find it before I get the blame! Explore three unique and bizarre worlds Solve a variety of horrid puzzles along the way Four new types of goo for Henry’s goo shooter
